author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Technic (Speed Slammers) - Formula Force Review
review:
This set may doesn't have many play features but it's fun to build and to play with. We get a ramp, a car and a slammer which you can push to launch this vehicle. It's a nice and easy build and we also get a few stickers to worry about. The car has a great design and you can maneuver it very easily. It's a great set to have for sure.

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

Review

author: Dash_Justice
title: A red F1 racer.
review:
The Good:

  • Includes instructions for three alternate models.
  • Ramp and slammer make for good playability.

The Bad:

  • Slammer launcher is not as good as newer ones.
  • While the parts selection isn't bad, there's really nothing special.

The Verdict:

Overall just another average set, from an average Technic theme. The parts are common.
